structure.unit: ARTICLE II. BULK SALES OF PLANTS, AVOCADOS, LIMES AND MANGOES

text.section:
Sec. 8A-56. Penalty for violations.
Any person convicted of violating this article shall be punished by a fine not to exceed five hundred dollars ($500.00) or by imprisonment in the County Jail for a period not to exceed thirty (30) days, or by both such fine and imprisonment.
